detectors.description:
LibSecp256k1._invMod(uint256) (src/libs/LibSecp256k1.sol#317-360) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- q = r / x (src/libs/LibSecp256k1.sol#347)
	- x = tmp__invMod_asm_0 - q * x (src/libs/LibSecp256k1.sol#355)
detectors.markdown:
[LibSecp256k1._invMod(uint256)](../../thelist/2chronicle/scribe-v2/src/libs/LibSecp256k1.sol#L317-L360) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [q = r / x](../../thelist/2chronicle/scribe-v2/src/libs/LibSecp256k1.sol#L347)
	- [x = tmp__invMod_asm_0 - q * x](../../thelist/2chronicle/scribe-v2/src/libs/LibSecp256k1.sol#L355)

detectors.description:
ScribeOptimistic._opPoke(IScribe.PokeData,IScribe.SchnorrData,IScribe.ECDSAData) (src/ScribeOptimistic.sol#124-210) uses a dangerous strict equality:

Contract locking ether found:
	Contract Chronicle_BASE_QUOTE_COUNTER (src/Scribe.sol#523-528) has payable functions:

	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in ScribeOptimistic.opChallenge(IScribe.SchnorrData) (src/ScribeOptimistic.sol#213-287):
	External calls:
	- _sendETH(address(msg.sender),reward) (src/ScribeOptimistic.sol#278)
		- (ok,None) = to.call{value: amount}() (src/ScribeOptimistic.sol#586)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- OpChallengeRewardPaid(msg.sender,schnorrData,reward) (src/ScribeOptimistic.sol#279)
	- OpPokeChallengedSuccessfully(msg.sender,schnorrData,err) (src/ScribeOptimistic.sol#282)
detectors.markdown:

	External calls:
	- [_sendETH(address(msg.sender),reward)](../../thelist/2chronicle/scribe-v2/src/ScribeOptimistic.sol#L278)
		- [(ok,None) = to.call{value: amount}()](../../thelist/2chronicle/scribe-v2/src/ScribeOptimistic.sol#L586)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [OpChallengeRewardPaid(msg.sender,schnorrData,reward)](../../thelist/2chronicle/scribe-v2/src/ScribeOptimistic.sol#L279)
	- [OpPokeChallengedSuccessfully(msg.sender,schnorrData,err)](../../thelist/2chronicle/scribe-v2/src/ScribeOptimistic.sol#L282)

	- FullInlinerNonExpressionSplitArgumentEvaluationOrder
	- MissingSideEffectsOnSelectorAccess
	- StorageWriteRemovalBeforeConditionalTermination.
